source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_SEQ_00<tab>J'zula Tia has a troublesome task for an adventurer.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_SEQ_00<tab>ポルタ・プレトリアのジャ・ズラ・ティアは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_TODO_00<tab>Use sturdy hemp sacks to capture weakened yabbies.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_TODO_00<tab>弱らせた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2165701 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8B01 /var>を使い捕獲

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the squirming hemp sacks to J'zula Tia.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_TODO_01<tab>ジャ・ズラ・ティアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D8C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_000<tab>You're <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, aren't you? The famous soldier and adventurer? It might be that I'm asking above my station, but I could use your help with a bit of a problem.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_000お前さん、冒険者部隊の)) (( )) 02 /var>だろ？
ちょっと厄介な仕事を、頼みたいんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_001<tab>I've been tasked with rounding up a couple of nasty wavekin, and I have to admit to the fact that they're too much for me to handle. For a hero like you, however, I suspect they'd be naught more than a spot of light exercise before <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((dinner)) /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_001とある任務のため、魔物を何匹か捕獲したいんだが、
少しばかり手こずっていてね……。
冒険者としても有名なあんたなら、魔物の捕獲もお手の物だろ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_002<tab>Have you seen those monstrous yabbies crawling about south of the White Aisle? I have some large hemp sacks you can use to drag them back here. Just be sure to tire them out a bit beforehand─any fight left in them and they'll rip right through the sack with those spiky tails of theirs.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_002獲物は、ホワイトアイル陸橋の南に棲む「」だ。
充分に弱らせてから「」に入れないと、
鋭く尖った尻尾に破られちまうだろうから、注意しろよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_003<tab>As I said, make certain to knock the fight out of those yabbies before you shove them in the sacks. And watch out for those tails!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_003獲物は、ホワイトアイル陸橋の南に棲む「」だ。
充分に弱らせてから「」に入れないと、
鋭く尖った尻尾に破られちまうだろうから、注意しろよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_010<tab>Were you able to capture those yabbies for me?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_010<tab>どうだ、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2165701 /var>は捕まえられたか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_011<tab>Oho, these are some lively nippers─I'd best get them in a pen before they tear their way free. It's a good thing they're ill-tempered, though.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_011おぉ、なんて活きのいいヤツだ！
あつらえた袋が、今にも破られそうじゃないか……
だが、それくらいじゃないと意味がない。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_012<tab>Why is that, you ask? Well, just between you and me, we're planning on using the yabbies as a secret weapon to disrupt imperial military camps. I'd love to see the look on a Garlean officer's face to find one of these beauties running wild in his command tent.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_012実は、こいつを使って、
帝国軍を攪乱してやろうって作戦が、秘密裏に進んでいるんだ。
帝国の奴らの慌てふためく姿が、今から想像できるさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_013<tab>Why is that, you ask? Well, we're planning on using the yabbies to help train new recruits. You never know when the Empire might try to reclaim lost territory, and a little battle experience is better than none.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_013実は、こいつを使って、新兵の訓練をしようと思ってるんだ。
いつ帝国軍が属州を奪還に来るかもわからないからな、
追い払ったからって、気は抜けないってわけさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_014<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was growing tired of sewing up the holes in those gigantic sacks...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ927_02883_JZULATIA_000_014ありがとよ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
また何かあったら、頼むぜ。
